message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"evening meal; dinner","sentence":"晚上吃晚饭。","image_prompt":"A small family of three eating dinner together at a simple wooden table, bathed in warm light, with simple dishes on the table. The scene is set in a humble room at dusk, windows showing a darkening sky with a soft, post-apocalyptic orange hue. The environment hints at survival and warmth, with little details like slightly worn furniture and hopeful expressions, all depicted in a soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"Eat dinner in the evening."}
